trans-unit.source: Select the kind of page you want to create. You can see the basic layout in the icon below the selector box.
Select alternative page design for subpages.
Subpages to this page will normally use the same design as you have set in the "Page Design" field above. However you can select an alternative structure here to be used by all subpages.
Select the content and / or flexible elements for your page.

Usually, these fields show you the content types that you defined in the selected page design above. If you use simple content elements, this fields gets automatically altered through the page module once you add content there.
